translation.acceptanceOfTermsText: By using MeeMee, you agree to abide by these Terms of Service. If these terms don't vibe with you, feel free to step away from our gathering.
translation.communitySpiritText: MeeMee thrives on community vibes. No vibes that dampen the spirit of togetherness will be tolerated.
translation.yourMeeMeeSpaceText: Your account is your MeeMee space. Safeguard it like you would your secret recipe for the perfect potluck dish.
translation.eventContributionsText: Your events, your rules. While hosting a gathering, be the gracious host you'd want to meet at someone else's event.
translation.privacyAndMinglingText: We respect your privacy like a whispered conversation in a cozy corner. Check our
translation.intellectualGatheringText: MeeMee is our collective masterpiece. No swiping ideas â€“ let's keep the creative potluck going.
translation.limitationOfEventLiabilityText: The real magic happens when people connect. We're not liable for any extraordinary connections or memorable moments.
translation.harmonyLawText: These terms dance to the rhythm of community harmony. Any disputes will be settled with a friendly dialogue, not a courtroom drama.
translation.questionsOrShareEventTales: Questions or want to share your event tales? Drop us a line at
translation.privacyPolicyIntro: At MeeMee, your privacy is our top priority. This Privacy Policy outlines how we collect, use, and safeguard your information.
translation.informationCollectedText: We collect information you provide when creating or updating your MeeMee account, such as your name, email, and profile details.
translation.eventContributionsTextPrivacy: When you create or participate in events on MeeMee, we collect information related to those events, including descriptions, locations, and attendee lists.
translation.deviceInformationText: We may collect information about the device you use to access MeeMee, including device type, operating system, and browser details.
translation.cookiesText: MeeMee uses cookies to enhance your browsing experience. You can disable cookies in your browser settings if you prefer. Check our Cookies Policy.
translation.howWeUseYourInformationText: We use your information to personalize your MeeMee experience, improve our services, and communicate with you about events and updates.
translation.informationSharingText: We do not share your personal information with third parties without your consent, except as required by law.
translation.dataSecurityText: We take measures to protect your information, but no method of transmission over the internet is 100% secure. We encourage responsible use of your MeeMee account.
translation.changesToPrivacyPolicyText: We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. You will be notified of any significant changes.
translation.contactUsText: Questions or concerns about your privacy? Reach out to us at
translation.enjoyMeeMeeExperience: Enjoy your MeeMee experience with confidence!
translation.landingPageHeader: Join our vibrant community ðŸŽ‰ Make friends, learn new things and have fun!
translation.changedMind: Are you sure you no longer want to attend this event?
translation.deleteSure: Are you sure you want to delete this event?
translation.title: Title
translation.selectPhoto: Select a photo for your event
translation.titleTooShort: Title must be at least 5 characters
translation.titleTooLong: Title must be at most 40 characters
translation.descriptionTooShort: Description must be at least 50 characters long
translation.invalidImage: Please select a valid image file
translation.cityTooLong: City must be at most 40 characters
translation.addressTooLong: Address must be at most 100 characters
translation.eventMin24Hours: The event must be at least 24 hours from now
translation.checkEmail: Just check your email for a message from us.
translation.activationNote: We've sent you a quick note to activate your account.
translation.peekInside: Make sure to peek inside your inbox!
translation.didntSeeEmail: Didn't see our email? Don't sweat it! Check your spam folder too.
translation.clickSpecialLink: Once you find our email, just click on the special link inside, and voila! You're officially part of the crew.
translation.cantWait: Can't wait to see you around!
translation.passwordLong: Password must be at least 8 characters long
translation.passwordError: Password must be at least 8 characters long
translation.generalError: Email or password is incorrect, please check your data
translation.selectAvatar: Select a photo for your avatar
translation.bioPlaceholder: Tell the world a little about you
translation.usernameError: Nickname must be between 4 and 20 characters
translation.passwordErrorUp: Password must be at least 8 characters long and include at least one letter, one number, and one special character
translation.registrationConflictError: Username or email is already in use.
translation.registrationError: Error during registration. Please try again later.
